span.cn: 为选定属性的关键帧动画产生弹性，包括普通的数字属性，或者路径属性。
span.en: Create elasticity for the keyframe animation of selected properties, including common numeric properties, or path properties.

span.cn: 路径反弹以及回弹，都支持平滑到下一关键帧
span.en: Path bounce and rebound, both support smoothing to the next key frame

span.cn: 发布脚本，支持路径和数字属性的回弹和回弹； 路径回弹时，支持平滑到下一关键帧
span.en: Release scripts to support the rebound and rebound of paths and digital attributes; when the path rebounds, support smoothing to the next key frame
